root_banner.main_title: Vestiq: the AI ecosystem that will boost your sales
root_banner.sub_title: Explore the best of Artificial Intelligence for stores, fashion, and design.

view-image-modal.deleteImageConfirmation: Do you want to delete this image?

sign_in_page.sign_in_message: Access your account now to use the best of AI for fashion.
sign_in_page.access_message: Access your account now to use the best of AI for fashion. If you don't have an account yet, sign up for Vestiq now to start using it in your creations.
sign_in_page.password_min_length: The password must be at least 6 characters long
sign_in_page.user_not_verified: User not verified. Check your email for the verification link.
sign_in_page.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred while trying to log in

sign_up_page.sign_up_message: Create your account now to start using the best of AI for fashion.
sign_up_page.name: First and Last Name
sign_up_page.name_placeholder: Enter your first and last name
sign_up_page.name_min_length: The name must have at least 3 characters
sign_up_page.password_min_length: The password must have at least 6 characters
sign_up_page.user_not_verified: User not verified. Confirm your registration by clicking the link we sent to your email.

forgot_password_page.description: We will send you a link to reset your password

home.dress_model_description: Add any unique clothing or full outfits to a model using AI.
home.txt2img_description: Create an image from a textual description. Turn ideas into visual representations for creative or conceptual projects.
home.render_traces_description: Turn your sketches, drawings, and drafts into reality with Vestiq's trace rendering tool.

header.prompt: What do you want to create today?

model_image_area.drag_file_instruction: To start rendering your image, drag a file
model_image_area.or_click_to_choose_model_image: or click to choose Model Image
model_image_area.model_image_area_info: For best results, use vertically oriented photos with well-visible, form-fitting clothing. Full-body or three-quarter shots with a neutral background and good lighting ensure a perfect fit.

garment_image_area.or_click_to_choose_garment_image: or click to choose Garment Image
garment_image_area.garment_image_area_info: For a perfect result, upload photos of the garment being worn by a real model or on an invisible mannequin. Ensure the clothing is well-fitted and visible, with a neutral background for better contrast and even lighting, without harsh shadows.

result_image_area.your_image_will_be_displayed_here: Your image will be displayed here

model_image_controls.title: Model Details
model_image_controls.cover_feet_description: Allows long clothes to cover the feet/shoes or adjust their appearance.
model_image_controls.adjust_hands_description: Modifies the model's hands to better adapt to the clothing.
model_image_controls.restore_clothes_description: Keeps parts of the original clothing that were not changed (e.g., keep pants when testing a blouse).

category_buttons.tooltip: Choose between Top, Bottom, or Full Body to adjust the clothing on the model.

type_buttons.tooltip: Photo type: Clothing only: Use if the image contains only the clothing item, without a model. Model: Use if the clothing is being worn by a model in the photo.

dress_tour.welcome_description: Here you can create amazing images by combining clothing with custom models. Transform the look with just a few clicks!
dress_tour.upload_image_description: To start creating your amazing images with Vestiq, the first step is to add the model image that will wear the clothes. You can upload an image from your device or create one from scratch using AI.
dress_tour.image_uploaded_description: Image uploaded successfully! After clicking on the white box and selecting an image from your device, it is now ready to be used!
dress_tour.create_or_select_model_description: You can also select or create a model.
dress_tour.select_existing_model_description: Choose a pre-existing model from the Vestiq gallery or select one you previously created. Perfect for those who want convenience and speed without needing to upload an image.
dress_tour.text_based_model_description: Describe the model you want to create using only text. Example: 'Woman with short hair, fair skin, wearing a neutral expression.'
dress_tour.generate_model_description: Here you can customize every detail of your model by choosing characteristics. It’s an interactive way to create the model, combining different elements for a unique result.
dress_tour.model_details_description: Adjust small details for a result that matches your preference. Click the arrow to expand the options.
dress_tour.upload_clothing_image_description: Here you can upload the clothing image you want to apply to the model. You can use a photo of the clothing alone or an image of someone wearing it for reference.
dress_tour.image_type_description: Choose how you want to upload the clothing item: Clothing Only – Upload an image of the clothing item alone, without anyone wearing it. Model – Upload an image where the clothing is already being worn by someone.
dress_tour.select_clothing_category_description:
Now, select which part of the clothing will be applied to the model.
Top – Clothing adjusted to the torso and arms.
Bottom – Clothing applied from the waist down.
Full Body – Clothing that covers the model's entire body.
dress_tour.generate_image_description: When you click 'Generate Image', the AI will apply the selected clothing to the model, adjusting the details for a realistic result. Please wait a few moments to see the final look!
dress_tour.view_result_title: Now It’s Time to See the Result
dress_tour.view_result_description: Your image will be displayed as soon as the process is complete.

welcome_tour.greeting_message: Here, you turn your ideas into amazing creations with the help of AI.
welcome_tour.welcome_description: This is the Vestiq welcome tour. We will show you how easy it is to create personalized looks with our platform.
welcome_tour.functions_list_description: This is the list of available functions in Vestiq.
welcome_tour.select_function_description: To get started, click 'Start' on the Dress Model option and see how easy it is to create custom looks.

verify_email.code_expired: Code expired. Please request a new one.

my-generations.no_generations_yet: Nothing here yet, but you can change that!

pricing.open_source_discount: Are you an open source developer?

plans_section.basic_description: All the essential features to get you started.
plans_section.expert_description: Advanced tools and capabilities for professional use.
plans_section.business_description: Comprehensive solutions and support for businesses.

save-generation-modal.title: Choose Save Location
save-generation-modal.subtitle: Navigate to the desired project or folder and click Confirm to save.
save-generation-modal.SVGNM-D400: Error saving the image. Check your connection or try again later.

move_generation_button.select_folder: Select a folder to move the images.

create_file.FSCF-D400: Validation error. Please check the provided data.
create_file.FSCF-D401: You are not authorized to perform this action. Please log in again.
create_file.FSCF-D403: Access denied. You do not have the necessary permissions.
create_file.FSCF-D404: Resource not found. Please check the data and try again.
create_file.FSCF-D409: Conflict detected. The name already exists or cannot be used.
create_file.FSCF-D500: Internal server error. Please try again later.
create_file.FSCF-D503: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
create_file.FSCF-D0: Connection error. Check your internet or try again later.
